reviews.review: As terrible to admit as it is but I was never really able to play though the original BioShock but after playing this game I have been inspired to go back simply to experiance more of the amazing environments that the BioShock team can create.
My life is better because I played this game.
Amazing, just play it.
One of my favorites of all time.

I fell in love with this game. Fans of Bioshock 1 and Bioshock 2 will not be dissapointed with this sequel. It may not provide horror atmospheres like in BS 1 & 2 but the journey and scenery of the game is what makes this game, very enjoyable. You've never played any other games that are like this. I've never thought about the idea of cities floating in the sky and the sky lines are fun and makes you feel cool when you're riding them while explosions and bullets fly around you. There's a lot more to compliment the game and I don't wanna waste anymore time. Just get the game, enjoy it. I have nothing to complain about what the game has to offer, everything is just awesome!
Amazing. Great art, cool story, awesome ending. A must buy.

После завершения игры, у меня ощущения того,что я побывал в великолепной Колумбии,в подлинности которой у меня не никаких сомнений.В плане сюжета все сделано восхитительно-вы не знаете чем закончится эта история.
Одна из лучших игр прошедшего поколения.Содержит в себе все лучшее от шутеров ,но с некоторыми оговорками.Великолепная история, которая не оставит вас равнодушными.
На данный момент,я с уверенностью могу сказать , что эта лучшая игра в которую я когда-либо играл.
This game is really nice and is truely an adventure. The environment is also very artistic.

Avaliação: ★★★★★

"Um dos jogos que você deve jogar antes morrer!"

Jogo simplesmente nota 10 e mais se for possível. Gráficos, jogabilidade, história e uma sequência digna do Bioshock 1. Ambos os personagens Booker, Elizabeth são muito carismáticos e críveis, assim como o próprio Comstock, o vilão. O jogo é um pouco mais fácil que os anteriores, então aconselho colocar na dificuldade Difícil caso esteja acostumado com o estilo. Não deixe de jogar as DLCs Burial at the Sea, pois complementam a história do Bioshock Infinite e inclusive a do Bioshock 1!. São imperdíveis.

Tudo no jogo foi demais e se há uma coisa que eu possa considerar como ponto negativo talvez seja o fato de haver apenas 1 Songbird, seria melhor ainda se ele fosse tão carismático quanto os Big Daddies.

Não deixe de jogar Bioshock Infinite e seus antecessores!
The art and soundtrack are beautiful, and it was pretty enjoyable for me.
Is very fun

Nice shooter, great story, amazing graphic. a must have !

This is probably one of the greatest pieces of storytelling in a game for many years (probably since the first Bioshock game...) and whilst the gameplay is nothing overly original it is solid, balanced and fun for the most part. Standard gunplay is livened up by the vigors (although these can turn out to be a little OP once you max them out), and the combat sections with skyrail segments are a joy to play through.

Criticisms? Fortunately these are both few and minor. As mentioned before the gameplay is a little "standard" and does fall into the trap of becoming a grinding shooter from time to time. There is also an odd point around three quarters of the way in where the story gets a little slow. As far as I am concerned that is about it!

Bioshock Inifinite, come for the story, stay for the soundtrack!
Absolutly I would recommend this game. It's the best step they could make after bioshock 2. I happend to enjoy 2 as well but this one is the best out of all three

BioShock infinite is an amazing FPS game with fantastic graphics, characters, and plot. It makes you think. A lot. I find myself going back and playing the game over again because I can find something new each time whether it's a secret room or gaining achievements (as you can tell by the 129 hours I've docked in this game as well as the many more I will have in the future). The gameplay is fairly easy to get used to and smooth. I'd defnintely recommend this game to anyone who is a hardcore fan of the BioShock series in addition to anyone who has yet to experience it.
The music in this game is terrific.
This game is great, it gave me goose bumps, no game has done that in a while!

Some people may say that this is just another dumb first person shooter, but let me tell you its more than that. The story of Bioshock Infinite drew me in so hard that after the end came to a close, i wanted to expirence it time after time after time. The combat mechanics range from from first person shooting, vigor use, tear use, and finding which strategy will over power your enemies. It was by far my favorite game of 2013 and quite possibly my favorite game of all time because it gave me hope that the first person shooter is still capable of telling engaging stories and having a mixed variety in combat and giving me multiple ways to take a situation. If you are a gamer and do not own this in your library then shame on you. 10/10 would play over and over again!
Definitely recommend this game and the burial at sea dlc's
A very fun game that is definitely worth playing, although the end gets a bit confusing. It was a pleasant experience.

Bioshock Infinite ist, zweifelsohne,  eines der besten Spiele dieser Generation.
Es kann als Shooter zwar nicht komplett überzeugen, jedoch ist die Spielwelt, die fliegende Stadt Columbia, und die Geschichte einfach großartig. Wenn man das Spiel beendet hat, sitzt man mit offenem Mund vor dem Bildschirm ohne verstanden zu haben was dort gerade geschehen ist. 
Es hat keine 08/15 Story von wegen, Terroristen hier, Russen da, sondern ist gut durchdacht und man bekommt eine emotionale Verbindung zu den Charakteren.

tl;dr Das Spiel überzeugt und ist mit eines der BESTEN Spiele dieser Generation. Absolute Kaufempfehlung.

EDIT: Ich habe das Spiel auf der XBOX 360 zweimal durchgespielt und bin jetzt mit dem PC beim dritten Durchgang.

Everything in this game is great. Graphics and art style hold their ground to most games today and the gameplay is refined lightyears ahead of bioshock 2. Only gripe is that once you've finished it, there isn't much to do. You can hunt for achievements but you're still playing the same scripted campaign levels OVER AND OVER again. Not much fun is it? Overall good game that really could have used multiplayer to get your money's worth. Buy it on sale.

To be honest, BioShock Infinite kind of dissapointed me. I do believe that it's overrated. The story overall was excellent, however it took me about 3-4 hours just to get hooked into it. Columbia itself was very nice looking, but after about an hour, it seemed to lose its charm. It doesn't relally matter, though, because for the majority of the game, you're indoors. Atmosphere was the best thing about BioShock 1 and 2 (in my opinion), and this game just doesn't seem to have it. I also didn't like how they made it so you can only hold two guns. The last thing I want to complain about are the firemen, or Infinite's Big Daddies. In BioShock, the big daddies were intimidating. They were slow, strong brutes who made creepy noises, yet they would quickly dash towards you and attack. Everytime I heard they heavy footsteps and the low groan, my heart started racing. The Firemen, on the other hand, aren't intimidating in the least. They're just big bullet sponges, nothing more. Overall, BioShock Infinite is a well made game, with great characters, and a really great story. I recommend it, but you should probably get it when it's on sale.
Game was fun, a little monotonous but fun
Just an amazing game, with great story and gameplay.
Jogaço... Muito bom mesmo!!!

Absolut empfohlen! Das Gameplay lässt teilweise zu wünschen übrig, aber Atmosphäre, Erzählweise, Grafik und Sound sind einwandfrei. 
Das beste am Spiel ist zweifelsohne die Story, deren Ausgang mich beim ersten Durchspielen tatsächlich sprachlos zurückgelassen hat. 

Mir persönlich hat Infinite sogar besser als die Vorgänger gefallen. Wer im Angebot zuschlägt, kann kaum was falsch machen.

Juegazo increible, obra maestra, lo recomiendo sin ninguna duda, una historia impresionante que te deja sin palabras y una jugabilidad increible y divertidisima, se va directo a mi lista de juegos favoritos.

BioShock Infinite hat mit seinen beiden Vorgängern nicht mehr allzu viel zu tun. In diesem Spiel ist nun wirklich einiges anders, angefangen von dem Setting (es spielt nun nicht mehr unter dem Meer) bis hin zu den fehlenden Plasmiden. Letztere wurden ersetzt durch "Salz-Skills", von denen es deutlich weniger Auswahl gibt, als noch zu Zeiten von Plasmiden. Das Spiel ist insgesamt sehr linear gehalten. Jedoch hat mir die Story sehr zugesagt! Schon lange hatte ein Spiel für mich keine so verschickte Story wie dieses. Vor Allem das Ende hat es storytechnisch sehr, sehr in sich! Mich hat es umgehauen, so psychisch durchgeknallt, wie das Spiel ist =)
Was mir noch gut gefiel ist die Tatsache, dass man fast das ganze Spiel zu zweit spielt, ein NPC Charakter in Form eines ansprechenden Mädchens rennt fast die ganze Zeit mir einem herum und versorgt einen im Kampf mit Nachschub, wie zB Munition.
Achja, ich hab es sehr vermisst, dass die Verkaufsautomaten nicht mehr "Willkommen im Zirkus der Werte" sagen...

Fazit:
Für mich ist es kein "echtes" BioShock Spiel, weil doch schon einiges anders ist, aber es lohnt sich aufgrund der Story dennoch durchzuzocken! Absolt empfehlenswert!!
